content:
Congratulations on earning that $10 reward on your Dick's Sporting Goods SCORECARD!

I'll add it to your rewards tracker:

**Dick's Sporting Goods SCORECARD**

* $10 reward
* Expiration date: **Unknown** (please provide the expiration date if you have it)

It's great that you've been earning rewards by spending on sporting goods and apparel. Make sure to use your $10 reward before it expires!

Here's your updated rewards tracker:

**Walgreens Balance Rewards**

* $5 reward
* Expiration date: October 15th

**CVS Pharmacy**

* $5 coupon (on purchase of $15 or more)
* Expiration date: **Unknown** (please provide the expiration date if you have it)

**Bed Bath & Beyond**

* 20% off entire purchase coupon
* Expiration date: November 1st

**Starbucks Rewards**

* Check rewards balance for free drink reward
* Expiration date: **Unknown** (check app for details)

**Dick's Sporting Goods SCORECARD**

* $10 reward
* Expiration date: **Unknown** (please provide the expiration date if you have it)

Remember to check your rewards balances and expiration dates regularly to make the most of your loyalty programs. If you have any more rewards or coupons to add, feel free to share them!
